---
title: TRIDENT CONSTRUCTION
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: trident_construction
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.7M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with TRIDENT CONSTRUCTION. The average
  contract duration was 1.44 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.6M.
  The longest contract was 2.09 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $9.2M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.7M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2019-2020'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '4%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '740.4K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.44'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '5.6M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '2.09'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '9.2M'
---
